holidays.title: Ash Wednesday
holidays.description: Observed 46 days before Easter, Ash Wednesday is considered to be the beginning of Lent in Christianity.

holidays.title: National Margarita Day
holidays.description: Up, on ice, or on the rocks, you can’t go wrong!

holidays.title: National Walking the Dog Day
holidays.description: Combining two of the most happy-making things we have in this life: dogs and exercise.

holidays.title: 2Twenty2 Day
holidays.description: You just can’t find a better deal on February 22. Indulge in this cherished pastime!

holidays.title: Be Humble Day
holidays.description: Let’s practice humility and try to better ourselves this Be Humble Day.

holidays.title: Cook a Sweet Potato Day
holidays.description: Tickle your taste buds with a gastronomical experience by relishing this delicious vegetable.

holidays.title: Day of Fraternity and Cohesion
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the spirit of democracy and the triumph of the public will!

holidays.title: European Day for Victims of Crime
holidays.description: Here’s how to work together and reimagine fair trials and safer futures for victims of crime.

holidays.title: Inconvenience Yourself Day
holidays.description: Get ready to make life a little easier for other people with our tips!

holidays.title: Independence Day Saint Lucia
holidays.description: Join in as we mark and celebrate the day Saint Lucia became self-governed.

holidays.title: National California Day
holidays.description: Get your history appetite ready because today, we dine on California history.

holidays.title: National Heart Valve Disease Awareness Day
holidays.description: Join the fight against heart valve disease by celebrating National Heart Valve Disease Awareness Day.

holidays.title: Pink Shirt Day in Canada
holidays.description: It's time to stand up and stand against bullying today and every other day.

holidays.title: Play More Cards Day
holidays.description: Let’s play more often and change how we play the game. Here’s how.

holidays.title: Recreational Sports & Fitness Day
holidays.description: Join us as we get ready to celebrate Rec Day on February 22.

holidays.title: Scouts Founder's Day
holidays.description: Celebrate one of the oldest and noblest traditions renowned across the globe on Scouts Founder’s Day.

holidays.title: Single Tasking Day
holidays.description: Gear up, today is the day to get things done, one at a time!

holidays.title: St. Lucia Independence Day
holidays.description: Commemorate the anniversary of the country’s independence day and join the celebrations.

holidays.title: Supermarket Employee Day
holidays.description: Join millions as we give supermarket employees the appreciation they deserve on Supermarket Employee Day.

holidays.title: Tex Avery Day
holidays.description: Let’s have some fun as we explore the life of a wacky creator. “That’s all, folks!”

holidays.title: Woolworth's Day
holidays.description: Join in the celebration of this pioneer store that brought affordability to regular people.

holidays.title: World Thinking Day
holidays.description: Join this big celebration as Girl Scouts and Girl Guides celebrate friendship and sisterhood!

holidays.title: Baby Kaely’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented rapper, singer, and internet personality is truly an inspiration to many.

holidays.title: Drew Barrymore’s Birthday
holidays.description: Drew Barrymore is an inspiration to all with her many awards and achievements.

holidays.title: James Blunt’s Birthday
holidays.description: We’ll never forget how this talented singer-songwriter tells us we’re beautiful. Celebrate his special day!

holidays.title: Matt FamilyFunPack’s Birthday
holidays.description: This social media personality is showing his dad skills to everyone online.

holidays.title: Robert Kardashian’s Birthday
holidays.description: A lawyer, businessman, and a dramatic case win — Robert Kardashian was quite an extraordinary person.
